title: Nice Buzz
author: Aleister
citation: Aleister. "Nice Buzz: experience with Morphine sulphate & Lorazepam (ID 67020)". Erowid.org. Jan 26, 2010. erowid.org/exp/67020
report: Took 4 10 mg morphine sulphate pentahydrate and chewed them (effective 7,5 mg x 4 = 30 mg of morphine)
feel happy, smiling, slightly 'cosy'and warm. enjoyment. nice.
